dynamic-ql-statement.hql-query: from NoticeEntity x where x.creatorId = :creatorId <@notEmpty name="noticeStatus"> and x.noticeStatus = :noticeStatus </@notEmpty> <@notEmpty name="subject"> and x.subject like '%${subject!}%' </@notEmpty> order by x.createdTime desc

from NoticeReaderEntity x where x.readerId = :readerId <@notEmpty name="seen"> and x.seen = :seen </@notEmpty>
<@notEmpty name="subject"> and x.notice.subject like '%${subject!}%' </@notEmpty> order by x.notice.sendTime desc
